issue.title: Upgrade crashes after re install
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

On an upgade of EasySDI. If the installer crashes, it is impossible to re install directly because of mysql errors on foreign keys, add columns etc...

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

I've added best practices in the wiki [[https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/wiki/4_development_best_practices]]
